channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Syrian Forces Battle Rebels Outside Key City of Hama
item.description: The rebels have set their sights on an area where President Bashar al-Assad’s government has long maintained strength.

item.title: Pickleball is so last year. An ‘endless’ surf pool is the standout feature at this private club where units start at $2.5M
item.description: "People today want to get out in the world and be active and wake up the next morning and feel good and be able to do it again."

item.title: Google Introduces A.I. Agent That Aces 15-Day Weather Forecasts
item.description: GenCast, from the company’s DeepMind division, outperformed the world’s best predictions of deadly storms as well as everyday weather.

item.title: Taco Bell will let you turn that taco run into a photoshoot with drive-thru photo booths
Elite Sumo Wrestlers Will Compete in London, a Rarity Outside Japan
item.description: A five-day event in October will be the Japan Sumo Association’s first competition in Britain in more than three decades.

item.title: Amtrak is riding high, notching an all-time record number of passengers in fiscal 2024
Influencers behind viral ‘Birds Aren’t Real’ phenomenon resurrect the defunct Enron brand and are using it to sell t-shirts
item.description: The original Enron collapsed 23 years ago.
